manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Step 1 | Exfoliate This deep-cleansing bar scrubs away dirt & exfoliates for clean, smooth, healthy-looking skin. Step 2 | Moisturize Lightweight, fast-absorbing moisturizer nourishes and hydrates body skin. Step 3 | Protect Aluminum-free, vegan deodorant provides all-day odor protection. Step 4 | Refresh Perfect after a shower or as a lightweight fragrance throughout the day. Next page The Turbo Regimen 1 EXFOLIATE 2 MOISTURIZE 3 PROTECT 4 REFRESH

Compare Exfoliators Rosemary, Eucalyptus AROMA Marine Aquatic Lava Rock, Butters KEY INGREDIENTS Charcoal, Jojoba DAILY USE CLEANSE & EXFOLIATE Body AREA OF USE Body SULFATE-FREE MASSAGING Rosemary, Eucalyptus AROMA Marine Accord Lava Rock, Butters KEY INGREDIENTS Volcanic Stone DAILY USE CLEANSE & EXFOLIATE Body AREA OF USE Body SULFATE-FREE MASSAGING
The Turbo Family Now you can cleanse, moisturize, protect, and refresh–all Turbo, all the time! 1 2 3 4 5

Meet Jack Black Welcome to prestige men’s skincare that is Dermatologist tested, paraben free, cruelty free, and free of harsh sulfates. Simple. Masculine. Effective. Jack Black. The #1 Men’s Skincare Brand.*

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smell like a millionaire - you own the forests, the mountains, the oceans
reviews.reviewText: Seriously, one of the most wondrous smells you will ever come across.First off, let me just get the functionality of the soap out of the way. It will get you squeaky clean. Literally. Made with the finest ingredients and moisturizers. And the best part is that soap bars always go a long way.Now to the true effects of the soap (after you come out of the shower). I've tried several body washes and soaps which smell great but as soon as I wipe myself with the towel, I don't sense the scent linger on my skin/body. When you have a high quality product like this Turbo Bar, trust me when I say hours later this amazing scent will linger on your skin and really ravel people's senses around you.Now to my favorite and the best part: the scent, fragrance, smell, whatever you want to call it. I'm a very outdoorsy person. I'm talking adventurous.. campfires, mountain hiking, cabins, wild explorations in the forest, etc. This scent gives me the same rush. It smells like nature. But not the annoying nature smell. The GREAT one. Smells like fresh pine forests at the top of a mountain with a hint of firewood and neroli after you've just come out of a dip in a pool filled with the best essential oils. The perfect word is FRESH.Seriously, the freshest smell there is. Girls will go crazy over this smell. I get compliments all the time from people thinking it's the cologne I'm wearing but really in my mind I know the secret. And it's this: Jack Black Turbo Body Bar.Become one with nature with this stuff. Smell like a millionaire.***UPDATE***This is an update just to inform potential buyers how long this soap bar lasts. I first bought this bar in late September/early October of 2013. I just bought my second bar a few weeks ago. The fact that one bar lasts half a year is beyond my imagination. So people claim that it's "expensive". Well, first, realize that you're investing in a quality soap (investing in the well being of your body, rather). And besides that, you're spending a measly 30 bucks on soap for 365 days. Even if you buy 3 bars, ok so $45 bucks, no biggie compared to those liquid body washes that you have to buy every 2 or 3 months that don't even last. There's a reason guys in the 60's were getting laid left and right (like in Mad Men)... they used soap bars. Trust me when I recommend this product. It lasts forever. My only recommendation is to buy a body sponge/loofah (google it). It's the most effective way to use a soap bar. Wet the bar, rub it a few times against the sponge to form a lather, and you're good to go. If you're using the bar and physically rubbing it all over your body, you're doing it wrong. And on a side note, it lasted me almost 6 months, and I take showers about 5 out of 7 days, so clearly the situation proves that if done right, this bar can last you a long time and it's a high quality product.Also, just to add I may sound crazy but I also bought their body wash liquid version (10 oz.) of this and I just top off and end my wash with some of this. I really just wanted to try it rather and it smells like this amazing Bengay/aroma scent that really clears your nasal passageway. BUT I'm sticking to this soap bar. Smells better, lasts longer. Below is the link for the liquid body wash. Jack Black Turbo Wash Energizing Cleanser for Hair & Body, 33 fl. oz.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my hubby, he's was a devoted coast user. I felt like this would be better for his skin. He and I like the manly scent. The bar has what I think is like ground gritty type exfoliate in it. It feels nice on my skin and cleans well. Hubby's skin is definitely looking better, not his normal dry elbows anymore. We have hard water so it's hard on the skin. My hubby hates the feel of left over moisturizer that body wash leaves but he really likes this bar. He likes it so much its on auto ship. It does last well and he showers twice a day. It sounds pricey but not for what you get.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy The Expensive Soap.
reviews.reviewText: First impression:Smells awesome! Minty and herbal and very strong. The lather is outstanding and it doesn’t dry my skin out.After several weeks, a single bar is lasting a long time. All of the first impressions are holding up. My shower is better than a day spa.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Soap bar - Cost only negative
reviews.reviewText: I bought 5 different soap bars, from Jack Black Turbo Exfoliating Bar, Squatch Exfoliating Cedar, Anthony Soap Bar Exfoliating and Southern Natural Charcoal soap.Turbo bar is great overall - good exfoliating, good smell, good lather, just doesn't last too long for the amount it cost.I would say Marlowe and Jack Black are by far the best exfoliating bars and also probably the most expensive.Marlowe leaves you feeling of squeaky clean, not as good as the Jack Black, and gives you the best exfoliating like using a almost sandpaper.Anthony soap bar gives you the moisturizing and probably the gentlest exfoliating, just a bit better than the Dr. Squatch brand.Sent wise, they are all very light and not strong or long lasting. Again overall Marlowe and Jack Black stood out for me. Dr. Squatch smelt the worst in my opinion.Southern Natural Charcoal bar was interesting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Greatest Soap Bar Ever
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this soap bar and it arrived quickly. I absolutely love the scent of it and like other reviewers have been saying, this soap bar seems like its going to last for a long time. I have not used a soap bar that ever matches the quality of this. I primarily was using men's dove soap bars or AXE body wash (Never buying AXE again by the way). It creates a rich and somewhat thick lather especially when rubbed against hair (I have pretty hairy legs). It cleans very well. I would recommend the use of a loofah since it not only will increase the life of the bar, but it seems to work very well with the loofah, it creates the same thickness of lather. The reason I did not rate this 5 stars is because when I received the bar one of the corners had a pretty large dent in it. This most likely isn't the fault of Jack Black, it probably occurred while shipping.Pros:Long lifeSmells greatRich latherCons:Price (But the price seems to be well worth it)I plan on buying this again in the future and I would recommend it to everybody.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good product, price is higher than expected, will consider purchasing again in future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Another quality Jack Black product
reviews.reviewText: Ha! I just said it's soap. But everyone is writing like it's the greatest thing since sliced bread.Come on guys! - It's good - the smell (like all Jack Black products) is awesome - BUT it doesn't stay with you - NOR should it (unless you just really want to smell like a bar of soap - NOT!). It's a perfect compliment to the liquid TurboWash. If you shower at the gym and you don't want to mess with liquid soap - this is a viable option.Pluses: It doesn't break down in a soap dish like other soaps do. It lathers great It has a great smell Its a hard version of the liquid soapMinuses: Its expensive (but then, how much is your body worth to you???) It's big and cumbersome to hold (ok, I don't have huge hands so i'm wondering how people with smaller hands deal with this) I'm good with the liquid
This soap has exfoliating feature and has a nice scent. This soap lasted me for quite some time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 18, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Love the scent love how fresh it leaves you’re skin. Perfect after the gym.
Smells nice, doesn’t dry skin and lightly exfoliates. Still use anti bacterial soap before applying this one…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 30, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: Decent smell, feels like it'll last awhile
reviews.reviewText: I needed a nice solid soap so I could pass through airport security with easeThe smell is quite nice, doesn't take much to produce a decent lather, has made my life easier getting through airport security without liquidsHave always been a liquid soap kinda guy, but this may sway me to use their solid soaps full time
Smells great and cleans really well
